Mavic3M.name: Mavic3M
Mavic3M.spec:
Dimensions & Weight: 193 x 172 x 180 mm; 1041g 
 Super Durable S-GS Global Shutter 
 Effective Pixels: Over 25 million pixels single lens; totalling exceeding 125 Million Pixels 
 Sensor Specifications: Size - 23.1 x 15.4 mm, Pixel Size - 3.76um 
 Lens Focal Length: Oblique - 35mm, Orthophoto - 25mm 
 Storage Capacity: 1280 GB

Matrice400.name: Matrice400
Matrice400.description: SHARE 203S PRO - 225 MP Five-lenses Oblique Camera
Matrice400.spec:
Dimensions & Weight: 182 x 203 x 196 mm; 1280g 
 Effective Pixels: 45 million pixels single lens, totalling 225 million pixels 
 Sensor Specifications: Size - 36 x 24 mm; Pixel Size - 4.4μm 
 Lens Focal Length: Oblique - 56mm, Orthophoto - 40mm 
 Storage Capacity: Dual 1280GB storage modules

Matrice4E.name: Matrice4E
Matrice4E.spec:
Dimensions & Weight: 182 x 203 x 196 mm; 1280g 
 Effective Pixels: 61 million pixels single lens, totalling 305 million pixels 
 Sensor Specifications: Size - 36 x 24 mm; Pixel Size - 3.76μm 
 Lens Focal Length: Oblique - 56mm, Orthophoto - 40mm 
 Storage Capacity: Dual 1280GB storage modules

Mavic3.name: Mavic3
Mavic3.spec:
Dimensions & Weight: 133 x 184 x 162 mm; 880g 
 Effective Pixels: 102 million pixels 
  Sensor Specifications: IMX461, Size - 43.8 x 32.9 mm, Pixel Size - 3.76um 
 Lens Focal Length: 50mm/70mm
 Storage Capacity: Dual 512GB storage modules

Fixar700.name: Fixar700
Fixar700.description: SHARE 6100X - Full Frame Single LensAerial Camera
Fixar700.spec:
Dimensions & Weight: 128 x 181 x 153 mm; 640g 
 Effective Pixels: 61million pixels 
  Sensor Specifications: Size - 36 x 24 mm; Pixel Size - 3.76μm 
 Lens Focal Length: Standard 40mm, Customizable to 56mm 
 Storage Capacity: 512 GB

HEQ.name: HEQ
HEQ.description: SHARE 2600 SDK -Three-Axis Gimbal Aerial Survey Camera
HEQ.spec:
Sensor Size: 23.1 X 15.4 mm 
 Image Size 6144 X 4069 px 
 Without Gimbal: 230g 
 Working Temperature: -10°C ~ +40°C 
 IP Level: IP53

Module_102MP.name: Module_102MP
Module_102MP.spec:
Dimensions & Weight: 193 x 172 x 180 mm; 1041g 
 Super Durable S-GS Global Shutter 
 Effective Pixels: Over 25 million pixels single lens; totalling exceeding 125 Million Pixels 
 Sensor Specifications: Size - 23.1 x 15.4 mm, Pixel Size - 3.76um 
 Lens Focal Length: Oblique - 35mm, Orthophoto - 25mm 
 Storage Capacity: 1280 GB

Module_61MP.name: Module_61MP
Module_61MP.spec:
Sensor size: 36 × 24 mm (8184 × 5460)
Weight of instrument: 1.55 kg
Data storage: 512 G*2
Pixel size: 4.4 μm
Storage temperature:-20°C to +60°C

Module_45MP.name: Module_45MP
Module_45MP.spec:
Sensor Size: APS-C (23.5*15.6mm) 
 Pixel Size: 3.91 um 
 Image Resolution: 3:2 （6000 × 4000） 
 Working Temperature: -10 ℃ ~ 40 ℃ 
 Storage: 1280 GB

Module_26MP.name: Module_26MP
Module_26MP.description: OBLIQUE CAMERA SURVEYOR 5 STANDARD with smart camera system
Module_26MP.spec:
Sensor : APS-C CMOS(23.5X15.6mm)
Lens : 25mm/35mm
Pixels Number : 24MP
Total Pixels : 120MP
Oblique Lens Angle : 45 degree
Total Memory : 320GB
Working Temperature : -10°C ~ +40°C

SHARE_505S_PRO.name: SHARE_505S_PRO
SHARE_505S_PRO.description: Cost-Effective Drone Solution for Commercial Operations
SHARE_505S_PRO.spec:
- FLIGHT DISTANCE : 60 km (37.2 mi)
- Setup time of less than 2 min
- Aircraft type : Hybrid (VTOL & fixed-wing)
- Wingspan : 1640 mm (5.4 ft)
- Number of rotors : 4
- Maximum take-off weight (MTOW) : 7 kg (15.4 lbs)
- Max payload weight : 2 kg (4.4 lbs)
- Maximum telemetry range : 40 km (24.9 mi)

SHARE_305S_PRO.name: SHARE_305S_PRO
SHARE_305S_PRO.spec:
Powerful 10,000 Lumens Brightness: See the big picture in the dark.
 Patented Camera-Tracking Drone Light: For enhanced situational awareness at night.
 Continuous Lighting with Rechargeable External Batteries: The light’s battery life matches the drone’s flight time.
 Perfectly designed for DJI Mavic 3 and next products: 
 Easy to mount and DJI remote controlled.
 Built-in Anti-Collision Lights: FAA-compliant for safer night flights.
 Robust and Reliable: Dust and water repellent.
